bill.title: Abandoned Vehicles; Repossession; Disposal
bill.description: Extends the time period during which the legal and registered owner of an abandoned vehicle may repossess the vehicle before it may be subject to disposal. Effective July 1, 2050. (SD1)

history.action: (S) The committee(s) on TIA/CPN has scheduled a public hearing on 02-07-11 1:15PM in conference room 224.

(S) The committee(s) on CPN recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes in CPN were as follows: 4 Aye(s): Senator(s) Baker, Galuteria, Nishihara, Slom; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 3 Excused: Senator(s) Taniguchi, Green, Solomon.

(S) The committee(s) on TIA recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes in TIA were as follows: 7 Aye(s): Senator(s) English, Espero, Dela Cruz, Gabbard, Kahele, Kouchi, Slom; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 0 Excused: none.
(S) Reported from TIA/CPN (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 58) with recommendation of passage on Second Reading and referral to JDL.
(S) Report adopted; Passed Second Reading and referred to JDL.
(S) The committee(s) on JDL has scheduled a public hearing on 03-03-11 10:00AM in conference room 016.

(S) The committee(s) on JDL recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in JDL were as follows: 5 Aye(s): Senator(s) Hee, Shimabukuro, Gabbard, Ihara, Slom; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 0 Excused: none.
(S) Reported from JDL (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 766) with recommendation of passage on Third Reading, as amended (SD 1).
(S) Report adopted; Passed Third Reading, as amended (SD 1). Ayes, 24; Aye(s) with reservations: none . Noes, 0 (none). Excused, 1 (Shimabukuro). Transmitted to House.
(H) Received from Senate (Sen. Com. No. 57) in amended form (SD 1).
(H) Referred to TRN, JUD, referral sheet 33
(H) Bill scheduled to be heard by TRN on Monday, 03-21-11 9:00AM in House conference room 309.
(H) The committee(s) recommends that the measure be deferred.
